personalInfo.name: Manish Reddy
personalInfo.summary: Backend Engineer with 3+ years of experience designing and building scalable, distributed backend systems, APIs, and data pipelines. Expertise in system design, microservices, and event-driven architectures. Proven ability to handle high-scale traffic, optimize latency, and build fault-tolerant systems using Python, Node.js, and cloud-native tooling. Adept at integrating and operating with large generative AI models and improving system and product quality through experimentation.

description: Built secure backend microservices integrating HubSpot via OAuth 2.0, enabling real-time CRM sync.
Designed scalable data ingestion pipelines for CRM objects, improving data availability for workflows.
Deployed containerized services with CI/CD pipelines, supporting multiple daily releases.
Improved backend reliability by enforcing API contracts, reducing integration defects.
Implemented distributed, event-driven microservices using Node.js, Python, Kafka, and Redis, scaling to 100M+ events/day.
Contributed to system design for high-traffic services, including load balancing and horizontal scaling.
Implemented Redis caching and rate limiting, reducing P95 API latency and protecting downstream services.
Optimized MySQL and MongoDB using indexing and cache-aside patterns to improve throughput.
Built secure backend services with OAuth 2.0 / SSO, ensuring authenticated access and data isolation.
Led migration to LLM-powered services, cutting maintenance overhead and speeding up feature delivery.
Developed RESTful backend APIs using Java Spring Boot for a banking platform, reducing query response time.
Optimized database access layers and service logic, improving backend performance and stability.
Implemented TDD and CI/CD pipelines, achieving 80%+ test coverage and reducing production defects.
Built backend services for a learning marketplace using Node.js and Python, supporting 1,000+ users.
Designed REST APIs for authentication, payments, and content delivery, improving transaction reliability.
Optimized MySQL and MongoDB schemas and deployed services on AWS, reducing hosting costs.

projects.name: Scalable Meeting Intelligence Platform
projects.description: Designed an end-to-end distributed backend architecture using FastAPI, Redis queues, and async workers to support fault-tolerant, non-blocking audio processing Implemented a queue-driven, multi-stage pipeline with clear service boundaries, improving throughput by 3x Built speaker-level segmentation, action items, MOM, and decision extraction, reducing manual meeting review time by 80% Applied caching, rate limiting, retries, and idempotent processing to handle partial failures and protect downstream AI services under concurrent load.
highlights: Designed a distributed backend using FastAPI and Redis queues for audio processing.
Implemented a queue-driven pipeline, improving throughput by 3x.
Built speaker segmentation and action item extraction, reducing review time.
Applied caching and retries to handle failures and protect AI services.

projects.name: SimCricketX – Real-Time Simulation Backend
projects.description: Built a real-time, multi-user backend system with Flask and REST APIs, managing concurrent simulations with consistent state handling Designed match orchestration and event processing using data-driven logic and queues, reducing hard-coded rules by 50% Applied caching and consistency trade-offs to balance correctness and performance under parallel users.
highlights: Built a real-time backend with Flask and REST APIs, managing concurrent simulations.
Designed match orchestration using data-driven logic, reducing hard-coded rules.
Applied caching to balance correctness and performance.

projects.name: High-Performance URL Shortener
projects.description: Developed a scalable URL shortener using Node.js, MongoDB, and Redis, handling high read/write traffic with low latency Implemented Redis caching and optimized lookup paths, reducing database reads by 70% and improving redirect latency by 60% Containerized the service with Docker, enabling fast local setup and reliable deployments.
highlights: Developed a scalable URL shortener using Node.js, MongoDB, and Redis.
Implemented Redis caching, reducing database reads and improving redirect latency.
Containerized the service with Docker for fast setup and deployments.

projects.name: OpenResume – Open Source Backend Extensions
projects.description: Designed and implemented backend features for project demo links and GitHub integrations in a large open-source codebase Built an LLM-based resume tailoring backend API driven by job descriptions, reducing manual resume edits by 80% in local usage Contributed via feature development, pull requests, and issue discussions, gaining experience with real-world open-source workflows.
highlights: Implemented backend features for project links and GitHub integrations.
Built an LLM-based resume tailoring API, reducing manual edits.
Contributed via feature development and pull requests.

suggestions: Focus on achievements relevant to the target role.
Use action verbs to start each bullet point.
changes: Enhanced summary to highlight relevant skills and experience.
Improved bullet points in experiences to include keywords from job description.
Enhanced project highlights to match technical requirements.
Reordered skills section to emphasize relevant technologies.
Added skills based on job description and existing skills.
